text: "Your Life Is Now" is a 1998 song by John Mellencamp and is the leading single from his 15th studio album "John Mellencamp". It went to number 3 in Canada, number 92 in Germany and number 15 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Track chart. == References == Category:1998 songs Category:Heartland rock songs Category:John Mellencamp songs
title: Your Life Is Now
